post:
We are happy to offer the following plans:

Xen VPS Features
  • Instant Setup (Subject to passing our fraud screening);
  • Standard Support Service;
  • Equal Share of CPU;
  • Each VM has a dedicated share of memory and disk resources;
  • Powered by Citrix XenServer or SolusVM;
  • Highly secure isolation of VMs from each other;
  • Full SSH root access to your VM;
  • Uncontended memory, the amount of memory in the VM plan is exclusively assigned to each VM, no "overselling" of memory is possible;
  • 7 Day Money Back Guarantee;
  • UK / GB IP addresses;
  • 99.9% Network Uptime Guarantee;
  • Connectivity: 100 Mbps port / 1 Gbps port;
  • Anti-DDoS protection;
  • VPS Service Price Match Guarantee;
  • We do not oversell server resources (hardware , hard drive or memory)!
  • Gaming VPS/Servers are welcome;
  • Price Match Guarantee!


Basic
Guaranteed RAM: Up to 8GB Memory
Disk Space: Up to 1TB HDD
Bandwidth: Up to 20TB Bandwith
CPU Cores: Up to 8 Processor Cores
Virtualization: Xen HVM Virtualization
Anti-DDoS: Auto Anti-DDoS protection
Access: Full Root Access
Control Panel: SolusVM / SSH Access
Service: Unmanaged Service
Uptime: 99.9% Uptime
Server Location: Roubaix, France (EU)
Cost per month: from £7.00/mo
More details: http://www.web-project.co.uk/basic-vps-hosting

Uptime: 99.9% Uptime

Uptime: 99.9% Uptime

http://www.web-project.co.uk/vps-hosting

Operating Systems Available:
- CentOS 5.x / 6.x / 7.x (32Bit / 64Bit)
- Ubuntu 12.04 (32Bit / 64Bit)
- Debian 6.0 / Debian 7.0 (32Bit / 64Bit)
- Fedora 17 (32Bit / 64Bit)
- CloudLinux
- any other OS on request

- cPanel and WebHost Manager (optional)
- Kloxo (optional)
- ISPConfig 2 (optional)
- ISPConfig 3 (optional)
